ovdesc.p: This table is used to store and maintain the loan information related to US Credit bureau reporting

desc.p: This field is used to store the Account status code as per metro2 format of Credit bureau reporting
This field is used to store Payment ratings based on overdue status as per metro2 format of Credit bureau reporting

valid codes are 0 = Current account (0?29 days past the due date) 1 = 30-59 days past the due date 2 = 60-89 days past the due date 3 = 90-119 days past the due date 4 = 120-149 days past the due date 5 = 150-179 days past the due date 6 = 180 or more days past the due date G = Collection L = Charge-off
This field is used to enter the legal compliance code as mentioned by Fair Credit Reporting Act(FRCA)

For account status codes 64 and 97(all portfolio types), this field is used to store the original amount charged to loss, regardless of the declining balance in the current balance and amount past due
This field defines the Community Reinvestment Act Reporting Type for a lending product.
This field defines the Origin of the Loan. It can take only values from the dropdown list. 1. Originated 2. Purchased.
Validation Rules:
This field is Mandatory.
This field is used to capture the Revenue of the Business or Farm of the customer.
This field is used to capture the Gross Annual Income of the borrower.
This field is used to define the type of Loan. It can take the values from the dropdown list. 1. By Institution 2. By Affiliate
This field is used to capture the Metropolitan Statistical Area /Metropolitan Division number
Validation Rules:
This field is mandatory only if CRA.TYPE is selected.
This field is used to capture the State. This field can take values from the dropdown list attached with the valid states
This field is used to capture the County of the respective State. This field can take values from the dropdown list attached with the valid County for the user
This field is used to capture the Loan location for census tract.
This is a User input field.
Validation Rules:
Up to 7 type A (alphanumeric) characters
This field denotes the total amount which is lent to the customer at the time of Loan Origination
